txt.en: The leader of the Jeweller's Guild would like to be reminded of the beauty of ages past.
The crafting recipes you must create can be bartered for from the Improved Recipes vendor.\n\nForge a guild-pattern ithilharn ring.
Execute the recipe for a guild-pattern ithilharn ring

'A jeweller's gift is the ability to make beauty that can withstand the passing of ages. Minas Morgul was once Minas Ithil, a place of great beauty. I have to believe some of that beauty survived in this now-wicked place.'

'A jeweller's gift is the ability to make beauty that can withstand the passing of ages. Minas Morgul was once Minas Ithil, a place of great beauty. I have to believe some of that beauty survived in this now-wicked place.'
Turn in a guild-pattern ithilharn ring ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to Aldúlf
'Bold, yet elegant. It is an excellent piece.'
Talk to the Jeweller's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
Turn in a guild-pattern ithilharn ring ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to the Jeweller's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
'Bold, yet elegant. It is an excellent piece.'
